file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-21-01-08 - PASSENGER SEATS - REPAIR

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PASSENGER SEATS - REPAIR EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH HYBRID PASSENGER SEATS 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to repair the seat food trays. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH HY- BRID PASSENGER 25-21-01-300-801-A PASSENGER-SEAT FOOD TRAY- REPAIR SEATS EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-21-01 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-21-01-300-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH HYBRID PASSENGER SEATS 2. PASSENGER-SEAT FOOD TRAY- REPAIR A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to repair food tray with damaged edges. (2) The materials approved to repair the food trays are shown in table 801: Table 801 - APPROVED MATERIALS APPROVED MATERIALS DESCRIPTION HSH, IP 1065B (FV 3210), Light Medium Original paint Gray Original adhesive L-301 FR adhesive HSH, IP 1065B (FV 3210), Light Medium Touch-up paint Gray Touch-up bonding material L-301 FR adhesive (3) The procedure permits paint touch-up at a minimum percentage. The amount of touch up 2 2 must be less than 38.70 cm (6 in ). There are no limits for the amount of original adhesive and paint used in this procedure. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) TT-I-735 Isopropyl Alcohol - Commercial grade AR Commercially available L-301 Adhesive AR Commercially available HSH, IP 1065B (FV 3210), Light Medium gray AR F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin EMB-145 - AMM 1285 300-801-A/800 25-21-01 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL H. Repair (Figure 801) SUBTASK 340-002-A (1) Remove loose material found in the gap of the food tray edges. (2) Clean the gap with isopropyl alcohol. (3) Fill the gap with L-301 adhesive. (4) Dry the surface with a clean, dry shop wipe. Make sure that there is no remaining contamination on it. NOTE: • The part will be clean when you pass a clean, dry shop wipe on the surface and the shop wipe shows no indications of dirt or debris. • Do not touch the cleaned surfaces. (5) Paint the edges with HSH, IP 1065B (FV 3210), light medium gray paint. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 300-801-A/800 25-21-01 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
